# SKANError.Code.invalidConversionValue

**Case**

The conversion value is invalid.

## Declaration

```swift
case invalidConversionValue
```

## Discussion

Apps provide a conversion value when calling [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/updatePostbackConversionValue(_:completionHandler:)] or [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/updateConversionValue(_:)]. Check that the conversion value you provide is within the allowed range.

## Error Codes

- **SKANError.Code.adNetworkIdMissing**: The ad network identifier in the ad impression doesn’t match the value in the information property list.
- **SKANError.Code.impressionMissingRequiredValue**: A required value is missing from a view-through ad impression.
- **SKANError.Code.impressionNotFound**: The system can’t find the ad impression.
- **SKANError.Code.impressionTooShort**
- **SKANError.Code.invalidAdvertisedAppId**: The App Store ID of the advertised app is invalid.
- **SKANError.Code.invalidCampaignId**: The campaign identifier that you provided is invalid.
- **SKANError.Code.invalidSourceAppId**: The App Store ID of the app displaying the ad is invalid.
- **SKANError.Code.invalidVersion**: The SKAdNetwork version number is invalid.
- **SKANError.Code.mismatchedSourceAppId**: The source app identifier in the ad impression doesn’t match the app identifier in the source app.
- **SKANError.Code.unknown**: An unknown error occurred.
- **SKANError.Code.unsupported**: Your app attempted to use functionality that isn’t supported in the specified version.
